rdf:Description.dc:title: Building and educating tomorrow's workforce : Alberta's 10-year strategy 2006 Alberta's 10-year strategy.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Human Resources and Employment.
Alberta. Alberta Advanced Education.
rdf:Description.dc:description: "Co-led by Minister MikeCardinal [Alberta Human Resources and Employment] and [Alberta] Advanced Education Minister Denis Herard."

Long-term labour force development strategy, which outlines a number of ways government and organizations can work together to meet skill and labour shortages and ensure the province remains globally competitive.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Labor supply
Manpower policy
Skill shortages Alberta.
Labour strategy Alberta.
